title: Dump c++ class definitions from .exe + .pdb on windows
content:
Is there any way to dump C++ class definitions on windows if executable and PDB files are available. I've seen this done before using 
gdb
but haven't had any luck doing this on windows. I've tried disassembling executable in free version of IDA but structures tab doesn't show any classes. EDIT: I found this tool, but it only works for 
C
structs: https://github.com/wbenny/pdbex
